value.title: Man Accused Of Stealing Dead Brother's Identity In 1965 Caught With Facial Recognition
value.excerpt: BANGOR, Maine (AP) — An 86-year-old man accused of assuming his brother’s identity decades ago and using it to double dip on Social Security benefits has been convicted of several charges, caught by facial recognition technology that matched the same face to two different identities, authorities say.
